subject: AI & Agents
title: Maturity Levels: From Manual to Fully Automated
description: A short lesson to help you apply Maturity Levels: From Manual to Fully Automated.

hook.text: Level 0: a data scientist manually deploys a pickle file. Level 3: everything is automated.

buildup.text: Google's MLOps maturity model defines three levels of automation.

discovery.text: Level 1: automated training pipeline. Level 2: automated CI/CD for models.

twist.text: Most teams are at Level 0. Getting to Level 1 delivers the biggest ROI.

climax.text: Start manual, automate the pain points, and level up incrementally.

punchline.text: Don't automate everything at once. Automate what hurts.
